name: Not Dead Enough
description:
Not Dead Enough is a first person zombie shooter that takes place in the near future where zombies have taken over the world. You play as one of four characters who were sent to clear out an apartment building and soon find yourself stuck in an apartment and must now fight to defend yourself.

The game was developed for a university group project over the course of one semester.

Intructions:

  1. Extract the contents of the zip folder
  2. Launch "MuiltiplayerPrototype.exe" to lauch the game
  3. In the main menu click on "Single Player" to play the game.
